testcase.name: TC08 'Products' button tiklanir
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to "autoUrl".................................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on Products button................................................passed And Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully..............passed And The products list is visible............................................passed And Click on View Product of first product..................................passed And User is landed to product detail page...................................passed And Verify that detail detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand.passed
